DOC.brief_summary: The University California , San Francisco ( UCSF ) Simons Variation Individuals Project ( Simons VIP ) currently recruit healthy control study aim well understanding autism spectrum disorder . The UCSF site Simons VIP conduct functional structural imaging , neuropsychological evaluation , genetic testing , neurologic exam healthy individual compare finding autism spectrum disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Simons Variation Individuals Project , Functional Common Acquisition Protocol
DOC.detailed_description: To good understand autism spectrum disorder , UCSF Simons VIP team recruit healthy control participate study involve brain image psychological assessment questionnaire . The study involve phone interview , cognitive testing questionnaire , genetic testing , physical exam , photograph , non-invasive brain imaging session ( MRI MEG ) . The study take 17 hour complete , may 5 study visit UCSF UC Berkeley .
DOC.criteria: Healthy person age 7 old Must use English primary language Must able lie still MRI scanner two hour Must willing travel UCSF UC Berkeley 5 study visit . Any metal implant body Extensive dental work History psychiatric neurological illness History drug alcohol abuse
